about_the_game:
In a vast and treacherous jungle, you are thrust into a primal battle for survival against relentless, prehistoric predators. The once-thriving ecosystem is now your worst nightmare, as ferocious dinosaurs roam the terrain, ready to strike at any moment.

Your goal is simple yet harrowing: stay alive. Explore the jungle, scavenge for resources, and find shelter while evading the sharp claws and teeth of these ancient beasts. The dense vegetation and rugged terrain provide both opportunities for escape and challenges to overcome.

Every step brings new dangers and choices. Will you attempt to outwit the predators by using your surroundings to your advantage, or risk everything in a desperate sprint for safety? The jungle is alive with tension, and only the most resourceful will endure its challenges.

This is not just a test of survival—it’s a relentless fight against nature's most fearsome creatures. How long can you last in a world where you are the prey?
detailed_description:
In a vast and treacherous jungle, you are thrust into a primal battle for survival against relentless, prehistoric predators. The once-thriving ecosystem is now your worst nightmare, as ferocious dinosaurs roam the terrain, ready to strike at any moment.

Your goal is simple yet harrowing: stay alive. Explore the jungle, scavenge for resources, and find shelter while evading the sharp claws and teeth of these ancient beasts. The dense vegetation and rugged terrain provide both opportunities for escape and challenges to overcome.

Every step brings new dangers and choices. Will you attempt to outwit the predators by using your surroundings to your advantage, or risk everything in a desperate sprint for safety? The jungle is alive with tension, and only the most resourceful will endure its challenges.

This is not just a test of survival—it’s a relentless fight against nature's most fearsome creatures. How long can you last in a world where you are the prey?
name: Survive the Jurassic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

short_description: You're placed in a small, secluded house hidden deep within a dense jungle teeming with danger. The calm is short-lived as the ground shakes and distant roars grow louder—dinosaurs are closing in. Your only chance is to navigate the confined space, avoid detection!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Bulgarian*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean*, Danish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Finnish*, Greek*, Dutch*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Swedish*, Thai*, Czech*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Arabic*, Afrikaans*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Azerbaijani*, Basque*, Bangla*, Belarusian*, Bosnian*, Kannada*, Catalan*, Kazakh*, Cherokee*, Sinhala*, Konkani*, Croatian*, Dari*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Estonian*, Filipino*, Galician*, Welsh*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Hausa*, Hebrew*, Hindi*, Igbo*, Yoruba*, Irish*, Icelandic*, Khmer*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malayalam*, Malay*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Persian*, K'iche'*, Kinyarwanda*, Kyrgyz*, Quechua*, Sotho*, Sindhi*, Sorani*, Swahili*, Serbian*, Tajik*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Tatar*, Tamil*, Telugu*, Uyghur*, Wolof*, Urdu*, Uzbek*, Valencian*, Xhosa*, Zulu*, Scots*
